publishing_focus.primary_focus: Manga and manhwa covering gaming, pop culture references and more
publishing_focus.target_audience: Otaku culture enthusiasts, predominantly in their teens and twenties
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: Our immersive, niche content speaks directly to the otaku community, bridging the gap between East and West
publishing_focus.example_titles: Titles like 'Sword Art Online' and 'The King's Avatar'; authors similar to Reki Kawahara
